MORPH_DESCRIPTION: Using this command on a card will alter its appearance in various unpredictable ways
CANNOT_MORPH: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
CANNOT_MORPH_BANNER: {{author}} The **Banner** code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
MORPH_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to morph your **{{characterName}}** card?
NOT_ENOUGH_SILVERS: You don't have enough **{{currency}}** for this process
NAME: Name: **{{name}}**
ROLL_MORPH: The morph will be lost after 2 minutes
FAILED: {{author}} Something went wrong, please try again
STOLE_MORPH: Something went wrong, please roll another morph
NO_CARD: {{author}} The card is not in your collection anymore
MORPH_CONFIRM: {{author}} Successfully applied the **{{morphName}}** morph to your card
REROLL: You cannot undo any more morphs
CANNOT_APPLY_MNC: {{author}} You cannot apply {{article}} **{{eventType}}** morph on **{{eventCardType}}** or **3D** cards
CANNOT_APPLY_3D: {{author}} You cannot apply {{article}} **{{eventType}}** morph on **3D** cards
NOT_YOUR_BANNER: {{author}} You do not own this banner
BANNER_COST_INFO: Applying this morph will cost 1000 Silvers
